title: Urbanization in Nigeria 2018
yAxis: Share of urban population in total population
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of urban population in total population, containing a total of 11 data points.
In general Share of urban population in total population has rose over the Year.
Share of urban population in total population is slightly increasing from 2008 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
Maximum Share of urban population in total population, about 50.34 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Share of urban population in total population about 41.7 was reached at Year 2008

max_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of urban population in total population, containing a total of 11 data points.
Overall Share of urban population in total population has increased over the Year.
Share of urban population in total population is slightly increasing from 2008 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
Maximum Share of urban population in total population, about 50.34 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Share of urban population in total population about 41.7 was reached at Year 2008
